name: Indiacitys.com Technologies private limited
overview:
Indiacitys.com Technologies private limited provides following list of online services to India and worldwide.

  1. Price comparison website www.indiacitys.com to compare online shopping products from different shops/brands. It also provides facility to Merchants to list shopping products for free for unlimited number of days

  2. Free classified site classifieds.indiacitys.com. This service is free of cost and all listings are available for free to customers to add their classifieds listings, buy and sell products for free.

  3. Domains and Hosting sale in our website www.buysite.in

  4. Online jobs portal for India www.findyourjob.in and onlineresume.in

  5. Indian city based classified websites for, Mumbai, Delhi, Kolkata, Hyderabad, Bangalore, Tamil classifieds, Chennai, Trichy, Madurai, Coimbatore, Erode, Gobichettipalayam

Specialties Online Classifieds, Online shopping to compare price of products, Domains and Hosting sale, Online jobs portal
